author: snbhaumik
title: Munnar-Kumarokom
text: I am going to Munnar-Kumarokom with the following itinerary: Mumbai to Munnar on 18th September via Kochi by flight Munnar to Kumarokom on 22nd September Kumarokom to Munnar on 25th September by flight. In this regard, I look forward to guidance on the following: (a) How to reach Munnar from Kochi airport - public transport or cab/taxi? If I avail cab/taxi, whether that needs to be pre-booked or readily available at the airport and how much is the fare (b) How to reach Kumarokom from Munnar - public transport or cab/taxi? If I avail cab/taxi, whether that needs to be pre-booked or readily available at the airport and how much is the fare (c) How to reach Kochi airport from Kumarokom - public transport or cab/taxi? If I avail cab/taxi, whether that needs to be pre-booked or readily available at the airport and how much is the fare (d) Suggested sightseeing places in and around Munnar and how the same can be covered? (e) Suggested eateries in and around Munnar (f)Suggested sightseeing places in and around Kumarokom and how the same can be covered? (g)Suggested eateries in and around Kumarokom (h) Any other travel trip Thanks
